short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The name pretty much sums it up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A command line based, no buttons, RPN calculator


Note:
This extension will soon expire
The latest version of the calculator is available as a webpage:
https://celerisk.com/rpncalc/


Comes with all stack and math functions known (to me that is), features basic plotting capabilities and offers limited programming


1 2 3 * + <enter>
2 mode.precision drop PI Q <enter>
